channel.title: The Comic Book Novice Radio Show
channel.description: Welcome to M.F.C. Studios Inc., home of The Comic Book Novice radio show, the East Coast's leading weekly call-in radio show broadcast in Long Island, New York where we interview industry professionals and discuss every topic concerning comic books. We also provide prizes for lucky listeners. Be sure to listen every week for details!
channel.itunes:author: MFC Studios, Inc.
channel.itunes:keywords: Comics, comic, books, MFC, Studios, Mark, Torres, Hassan, Godwin, Peter, Palmiott,i Belkis, Cardona-Rivera, Jennifer, Smith, Brian, Ferrara
channel.itunes:subtitle: The authority in comics!
channel.itunes:summary: Welcome to M.F.C. Studios Inc., home of The Comic Book Novice radio show, the East Coast's leading weekly call-in radio show broadcast in Long Island, New York where we interview industry professionals and discuss every topic concerning comic books. We also provide prizes for lucky listeners. Be sure to listen every week for details!
